item.title: Xbox 720 plans leaked + Kinect 2
item.dc:creator: zim
item.description:
No doubt the first models will catch fire or something and it will be a huge fucking disaster like the 360 all over again. This thing looks slightly better than the Wii U buts thats not saying much.

Read full topic

item.title: Xbox 720 plans leaked + Kinect 2
item.dc:creator: xalener
item.description:
Llewen Ebag:

Xalener, I know what you’re getting at. It’d be cool if they sold it to indie/small developers in case they need cheaper equipment (well I guess it’s at least cheaper). But frankly, I don’t see how making some idle gestures would help the game any better. Although, that’s probably just me thinking with my medieval brain not used to a machine that doesn’t run on power coming from a horse/river.
I remember the Extra Credits episode on Kinect. The whole “making the controller fun” thingamajig is something I can’t really wrap my mind around. Maybe some shining saviour will come from down from the diamond encrusted pearly gates to make Kinect worth it all along.

This is under the assumption that they’re just going to throw minigames at the kinect or shove kinect functionality into a game and expect it to work like they have been. It doesn’t have to be that way. Child of Eden is a great example of a Kinect game done right. Probably the only one sadly.

Read full topic

I remember the Extra Credits episode on Kinect. The whole “making the controller fun” thingamajig is something I can’t really wrap my mind around. Maybe some shining saviour will come from down from the diamond encrusted pearly gates to make Kinect worth it all along.

item.title: Xbox 720 plans leaked + Kinect 2
item.dc:creator: xalener
item.description:
Kinect is probably one of the most versatile and awesome peripherals every sold. It just sucks for it’s intended purpose.

It’s a a cheap affordable solution for mocap and 3d scanning. People have done ‘useful’ shit with it like used it to map out the interiors of disaster areas… It’s just too fucking cool. Next version… You bet your ass I’m getting it.

Read full topic

item.title: Xbox 720 plans leaked + Kinect 2
item.dc:creator: Comrade_Tiki
item.description:
xalener:

Kinect 2? Seriously, Fuck yeah.

Okay, that was kinda cool. Honestly I don’t give a shit about the visual distortions, either.

I want Google to do this with their augmented-reality glasses. I want them to use three cameras watching you in a triangle so you don’t get too many missing faces. And I want them to use some hardware other than a wand to interact with the environment… I’m tired of wands and 'motes. How about something that wraps around the palm?

The mesh is obviously jerky, but it’s well within the realm of software to convert to voxels of varying resolution.

I predict the next step is to improve capture-display quality and augment the image to remove display-hardware from over the eyes.

Read full topic

item.title: Xbox 720 plans leaked + Kinect 2
item.dc:creator: JohnWorfin
item.description:
sersoft:

Not a fan of Microsoft because they are mass producing computers that cannot run Windows, their most widely accepted Operating System.

So this is why they talked about Windows 8 for ARM… I bet the Xbox 3 version doesn’t have any of the Window management capabilities, only tiles.

The xbox , while having a basass tripple core PPC cpu only runs 64mb of ram. Windowd would choke. I mean, Why would they take something that works great all by it’s self and then make it work OK or worse by putting windows on it?
Microshaft has always maintained a RISC build of windows but they never release it. Windows for arm is just to make it tablet competitive
